alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 10:27PM CDT until June 26 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 1015 PM MDT. * At 926 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Brownson to near Lorenzo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Lodgepole, Colton, Sunol, Brownson, Lorenzo and Sidney Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 49 and 77. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
